text:
@kanyewest You are a pawn who’s only purpose is stealing votes from @JoeBiden

You are being paid by @parscale and the Trump campaign for exactly that purpose.

You are not doing this because it was your own idea - you need to stop now before you ensure more people die.
#COVID19 #KanyeWest
